headline: Ford Stock Jumps 36% in 2025 as EV Investments Drive New Valuation Debate
summary: If you have ever wondered whether Ford Motor stock is actually undervalued right now, you are not alone. This is exactly where we dig in. Ford’s share price has climbed 36.5% year-to-date and is up 27.4% over the past year, making it a standout in a market full of shifting opportunities and risks. Recent headlines show Ford accelerating its investments in electric vehicles and EV partnerships, while ongoing labor negotiations and global supply chain stories continue to grab attention. This...

headline: Stellantis warns this issue could destroy the European auto industry

headline: Tesla struggles to course correct from sales skid
summary: (Reuters) -Tesla CEO Elon Musk has spent much of this year focused on the carmaker’s robotics pursuits and winning shareholder approval for his freshly minted $1 trillion pay package.  In the meantime, the outlook for Tesla's main business – selling cars – is darkening.  The electric-vehicle maker's sales fell 48.5% across Europe in October versus the same month last year, according to data released by the European Automobile Manufacturers' Association on Tuesday. ‌For the year, its sales are down about 30% in the region, while industrywide EV sales jumped 26%.
